title: If You Remove the Kind Protagonist’s Mask
summary:
For the sake of survival, I kissed the protagonist and we became partners. But I just can't believe that the 'kind' protagonist in the original novel was all an act!

"If I kill you, this partnership will be broken."

"You can't do that. We'll both die at the same time."

We were tied together by a tightly shared fate. Sharing the same wounds, the same pain, the same life and death. Plus, we had to have physical contact for the symbiosis?

When I found out about his mask, he was cruel to me with no hesitation. Unreasonable amounts of work, unreasonable demands… Why can't I be with another man?

"I've figured it out! How to break this partnership!"

Now that my life would be safe, all that's left is to get away―

"I have no intention of breaking it."

"…Pardon?"

"Just like you, I'm also curious," he held me in his arms and his gaze slowly descended to my lips, "I'm curious about to what extent our pain will be shared."

---
As the #1 stalker of Pope Ulysses, the kind male lead, Yoidel was to be executed for her crimes. Just minutes before her end, Yoidel escapes her cell to ask Ulysses for help, only to come across a bloody madman... who turns out to be the male lead himself! In a desperate attempt to survive, Yoidel binds herself to him in a magical contract, dooming the two to share their lives and deaths. Now stuck with a two-faced psycho, will Yoidel find a way to break their bond before it breaks her?

title: The Tang Clan Chronicles
summary: Fabre, a famous million-viewer streamer known for his daring encounters with venomous creatures, is bitten by a black mamba while filming in Africa and wakes up in the mystical world of Murim. To his surprise, the jungles of Murim offer him a peaceful farming life in which he enjoys cultivating various poisonous species. But his tranquility is short-lived when he crosses paths with members of the Tang Clan, the masters of poison and devious tactics. "I see potential in you. Become a part of our family.""

title: All My Alter Egos Are Tycoons
summary:
Seonghyeon Han is a victim of a violent crime that left him with impaired legs and a fear of the outside world. Now, he faces an even greater challenge: while he gained the power to create clones, he has just 24 hours before being sent to another dimension.

As the countdown ticks down, Seonghyeon makes a desperate move -- he sends his clone through the interdimensional portal, and discovers his real body can remain safe at home.

Thus begins the epic tale of Seonghyeon's... clones.

title: How to Send My Husband to the Abyss
summary: A noblewoman becomes the Empress' spy by marrying a mysterious count, only to discover he's far more dangerous than expected. Determined to expose his dark secrets, she plays a deadly game where the hunter might become the hunted.

title: The Regressed Mercenary’s Machinations
summary:
Cecil Perdium, the Mercenary King, was killed in battle before he could avenge his family. As he faces death, he learns that Duke Delphine, the man who caused the downfall of his family, didn't work alone. 

Suddenly waking up as his teenage self, Cecil must work to both overcome his poor reputation and build up his strength to save his family. With their soldiers and knights defecting due to the harsh conditions they must endure, he has his work cut out for him. 

Can Cecil become the mighty warrior he once was and avert his family's fate?

title: The Reason for a Confession
summary: "Why do I still have a dick?!" I was reincarnated in a yuri game, but there's something very familiar dangling between my legs... How will I enjoy my school girl (♂) life now?!

title: The Secret Bedroom of a Dejected Royal Daughter
summary:
Princess Llewelyn, who was once an outstanding princess but was now miserably abandoned. An ugly curse has been placed upon her with no one to protect her. It is a curse that makes her lust for men. In order to stop her curse, Llewelyn opens her bedroom... Four men are entangled with the abandoned princess. Will the truth of the curse be revealed? And who will be the man who will end up with her?

---
**Notes:**
* *The Secret Bedroom of a Dejected Royal Daughter* is the official English title of the Korean novel.
* Naver changed the webtoon's rating from R15 to R19. The novel is still R15, it has never released as R19. Naver R19 rating for the webtoon is more of a mature R17.

---
**Original Novel:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5575596), [Official English Translation](https://www.yonderstory.com/)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8614959), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=796867)

title: Love Under the Full Moon
summary: Koichi Hotaka is a second-year junior high school student who is a bit of a shy. One day, he meets a mysterious girl, Shima, who calls herself the "Witch of Alstroemeria" and is chosen as her "contractor". A fantasy of love and magic set on the night of the full moon!

title: The Spring Scent of the Sea
summary:
A collection of 9 masterpiece oneshots from 2001 to 2015. The pinnacle of heart-wrenching comic expression.

**Chapters:**
1-2. A Pantystocking World / The Pantyhose-like Sky (Pantystocking no You na Sora, パンティストッキングのような空) - Published in Young Jump 2003 Issues 27 & 28.

>At the beginning of the 21st century, high school students Mikami and Hiroshi are both longing for a similar ideal: An ordinary, happy life and Taepodong's attack!

>Twelve years later - in the Hateful and Politically driven contemporary Japan - Mikami and Hiroshi, who have now become old men, realize they can simply grab the ordinary and happy life they once hoped for in their youth!

​3. Teaser Trailer for a Modern Day Famine / Heisei Great Famine Trailer (Heisei no Daikikin Yokokuhen, 平成の大飢饉予告編) - Newly drawn.

​4. Classroom Chaos / Classroom Collapse (Gakkyuu Houkai, 学級崩壊) - Published in Young Jump 2001 Special Issue Mankaku Vol. 22.

​5. Scenes of Watanabe / Scenery With Watanabe-kun (Watanabe-kun no Iru Fuukei, 渡辺くんのいる風景) - Published in Young Jump 2001 Special Issue Mankaku Vol. 26.

​6. A Summer Day With No End In Sight (Itsu Hateru tomo Shirenu Natsu no Hi, いつ果てるとも知れぬ夏の日) - Published in Young Jump 2002 Issue 39. ([niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/28904))

​7. Future Century Shibuya (Mirai Seiki Shibuuya, 未来世紀シブーヤ) - Published as “In Search of Lost Time” (Ushinawareta Toki o Motomete, 失われた時を求めて) in Business Jump 2004 Special Issue BJ Tamashii Yuhi Special Issue No. 20.

​8. Mendel (メンデル) - Published in Quick Japan 2006 Vol. 68.

9-10. Early Morning (Asa Madaki, 朝まだき) - Published in Young Sunday 2007 Special Issue Summer Issue.

11-12. The Sole Ones (Yuiitsusha-tachi, 唯一者たち) - Published in Monthly! Spirits 2014 5/1 Issue.
___
**Additional Links:**
2-Volume Release: [Amazon](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B074CJYMWL)

title: Limit-Breaking Genius Mage
summary:
Verdan, a researcher who had no talent as a mage, aimed to reach the pinnacle of the Magic Tower through his genius intellect. However, after catching the eye of the Tower Master, he became one of the tower's test subjects. 

After enduring seven long years of humiliation and despair, Verdan finally begins to act, determined to break through his own limits using the theories he developed and the Magic Tower's power source!

title: The Reason for a Confession
summary: "Why do I still have a dick?!" I was reincarnated in a yuri game, but there's something very familiar dangling between my legs... How will I enjoy my school girl (♂) life now?!

title: The Secret Bedroom of a Dejected Royal Daughter

Princess Llewelyn, who was once an outstanding princess but was now miserably abandoned. An ugly curse has been placed upon her with no one to protect her. It is a curse that makes her lust for men. In order to stop her curse, Llewelyn opens her bedroom... Four men are entangled with the abandoned princess. Will the truth of the curse be revealed? And who will be the man who will end up with her?

---
**Notes:**

* Naver changed the webtoon's rating from R15 to R19. The novel is still R15, it has never released as R19. Naver R19 rating for the webtoon is more of a mature R17.

​7. Future Century Shibuya (Mirai Seiki Shibuuya, 未来世紀シブーヤ) - Published as “In Search of Lost Time” (Ushinawareta Toki o Motomete, 失われた時を求めて) in Business Jump 2004 Special Issue BJ Tamashii Yuhi Special Issue No. 20.

title: Limit-Breaking Genius Mage
summary:
Verdan, a researcher who had no talent as a mage, aimed to reach the pinnacle of the Magic Tower through his genius intellect. However, after catching the eye of the Tower Master, he became one of the tower's test subjects. 

After enduring seven long years of humiliation and despair, Verdan finally begins to act, determined to break through his own limits using the theories he developed and the Magic Tower's power source!

title: Urek Mazino
summary:
Before he became a legend, before the Tower trembled at his name—

Urek Mazino was just another Regular, climbing the Tower for a purpose greater than power: To chase after the enigmatic being, Phantaminum.

This is the untold story of Urek’s early days— his trials, battles, and relentless spirit as a chosen Regular. Witness the rise of the man who would one day shake the very foundations of the Tower itself. The legend of Urek Mazino begins here.

title: A Pig-Slaughtering Knife Cutting Through All Realms — Makes Sense, Right?
Perhaps Invincible
summary: Hyeol Yu is a third-rate warrior feared more for his menacing appearance than his actual skills. Branded by false rumors and endless misunderstandings, he has long been an outcast in the world of martial arts. But everything changes when Seolhwa, the woman he once vowed his life to, reappears before him as a true martial arts master. From that moment on, Hyeol is thrust into chaos, his name weaving its way through the ranks of warriors, sects, and factions. As his unwanted reputation spirals out of control, he is pulled into a conflict far greater than he ever imagined.

title: The Max-Level Player’s 100th Regression
summary:
Earth ends up in a worldwide death game where everyone from the ages of 15 to 29 must participate.

In this 20-round death game, Ryu Min stands alone at the entrance of the last round. However, the game taunts him, killing him for having not met the entry requirement of a minimum 5-man party.

Now, on his 100th and final attempt, he uses the information he learned from his previous 99 attempts to help raise the necessary companions to reach the end. Can Ryu Min finally beat the game, or will he perish in his attempt?

title: Her Majesty’s Night
summary:
The 17th Emperor, a woman, owes her throne to the Duke of Roark, who aided her ascent over her brothers. Though publicly revered, she harbors a secret liaison with the duke, her devoted supporter. 

Behind closed doors, she surrenders to him, shedding her regal facade. One fateful night, he breaches protocol, entering her chamber unbidden. Ignoring her protests, he asserts his desire, ravishing her despite her pleas. Authority crumbles in his presence as he claims her body, indifferent to her dignity. 

In his embrace, she is powerless, succumbing to his primal urges in a tumult of passion and betrayal.

title: How to Hide the Emperor’s Child
summary:
Astelle, the empire's one-day empress brought with her a secret when she left the palace after the divorce: she was pregnant with Emperor Kaizen's child. Six years later, Astelle is living a peaceful life in the countryside with their son until the imperial guards come knocking. Kaizen requires Astelle's consent to receive the key territory of Meilen. With the empire still in turmoil from a rebellion, will Astelle be able to hide her son's identity from these threatening forces, and more importantly, from his father, the emperor?

---
“You never loved me anyway, right?”

Astelle’s long-awaited marriage life ended in a day.

She worked hard to become Kaizen’s wife since she was ten, 
however, the only thing that was left for her was a disgrace as the banished-empress.

She was abandoned by her family; 
She was kicked out by the man she loved, Kaizen.

“Yes. You’re right. I didn’t love you.”

Astelle lied for the last time. 
For the sake of the man who was her reason to live and it was also for him who was her husband for a day.

She thought there is no point tp contact with him again, but-

“I think… I might be pregnant?”

–

Six years later, Astelle, who reunited with Kaizen, lied again.

“You… who is that child?”

“He’s my nephew.”

For the sake of protecting the child.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%99%A9%EC%A0%9C%EC%9D%98-%EC%95%84%EC%9D%B4%EB%A5%BC-%EC%88%A8%EA%B8%B0%EB%8A%94-%EB%B0%A9%EB%B2%95/2881), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58647802)

**Official Translations:**

* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/100859)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%98%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%8B%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B4/316)

title: Eleceed
summary:
Jiwoo is a kind-hearted young man who harnesses the lightning quick reflexes of a cat to secretly make the world a better place – one saved little child or foster pet at a time. Kayden is a secret agent on the run, who finds himself stuck in the body of a …um… decidedly fat old fluffy cat. Together, armed with Jiwoo’s super powers and Kayden’s uber-smarts, they’re out to fight those forces who would let evil rule this world. That is, if they can stand each other long enough to get the job done.

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/juexingbachanshiguan/list?title_no=1313)
- [Official Spanish <Es> Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/es/action/eleceed/list?title_no=2642)
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=2034)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000883)
- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=2861)
- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=3523)

title: The World After The Fall
summary: The middle-aged man and airsoft enthusiast Daisuke Koga is summoned to a different world on his 40th birthday. Given the ability to turn airsoft guns into real guns, Daisuke must save the other world while traveling back and forth between reality and the fantasy world. Alongside female swordsman Rena, Daisuke becomes the only gun user and dominates in the fantasy world after work!

title: The Villainous Admiral Wants to Catch Me in His Net
Incentive
summary:
Taekyung, the CEO of Sona Cosmetics, is a flawless and coldly rational boss.
Yuju, who had been harboring a one-sided love for him,
grows weary of being seen only as his chief secretary.
Unable to suppress her feelings any longer,
she submits her resignation after a year of silent longing.
But then...

“I forgot to give you your incentive.”
“What do you mean...?”
“I’ll give you what you want most.”
“Sorry?”
“Even if it means offering my body—your incentive.”

Without hesitation, he places his hand over her white blouse.

“But before we do this, let me make one thing clear. If you pull away again afterward, I won’t hold back next time.”

A secret temptation approaches her just as she tries to quit—<Incentive>.

title: Heavenly Grand Archive’s Young Master
summary:
The soul of the charming and imposing Martial Arts Alliance Leader, Hu-Gong, suddenly wakes up in the body of a young man.

That young man’s name is Beom-Hang. He’s the young master of the ‘Heavenly Grand Archive’, one of the three major archives of the Jianghu, yet he is a sorry excuse of a person.

To determine why his soul has swapped bodies, Hu-Gong begins to train Beom-Hang’s body. When the possessed young master of the Heavenly Grand Archive’s movements are totally different from how they used to be, it starts to attract the attention of the Jianghu...

title: I Adopted a Villainous Dad
summary:
One day I woke up and I was six years old. I had transmigrated into the main character of a tragic novel, Saint Priscilla, who walks through all sorts of thorny paths! Since I’m here, I need to avoid the scheduled special misfortune and live happily with my favorite character. The final boss of the story and the villain, Melchizedek, the tyrant of the Rehel Empire, who has no blood or tears! A happy life of adopting my father and becoming a princess, with my favorite character. I also saved the male protagonist, in order to remove my father’s death flag.

“If you approach my daughter, you will die.”

Why does my father keep putting up death flags?

Moreover… “If you tamed me, you have to take responsibility.”

Why is the male lead so obsessed with me? What’s going on?

---
One day, a girl awakens as 6-year-old St. Priscilla, the heroine of her most cherished novel. The catch? She is destined to suffer with an abusive adoptive family! To avoid this, she adopts her ultimate bias, the ruthless Emperor Melkiades, as her father instead. Although spending her days fangirling and redeeming her bias's tarnished name seems like a dream come true, with so many foes still lurking in the shadows, can this young saint protect Melkiades and find happiness for them both?

title: Manager Kim
summary:
"Please don’t touch the guy wearing glasses…"
Department head Kim, who quit his job as a special agent only for his daughter Minji and chose to be normal. Then one day, Minji disappeared silently, and Manager Kim began to find his daughter by turning the country that monitors him into the enemy.

title: I Tamed the Enemy Prince
summary: After losing his life in an accident, Kazuma finds himself reincarnated as the Ascalon Empire's third prince, Ares.  He wasn't born with the "stigmata", the proof that one is royalty and gives them extraordinary abilities, however, he still received love from his family and spent his days in peace. Until one day, his father's first wife, Germa barged into their home, and looked at Ares in contempt for not having a stigmata. In the end, she even put his mother, Erina in danger. Realizing how powerless he truly was, Ares decided to protect his family with his own power. He decides to enroll into Ascalon Academy, a prestigious school where one's capability decides everything!

title: For the Young Villain’s Happy Ending
summary:
[There was a pitiful girl who cried tears of diamond and lived while being abused by her family. But a prince appeared and killed off the entirety of the evil family. And so, the girl lived happily ever after with the prince.]

...is the fairy tale, but I reincarnated as the evil sister, 'Marcia Blick'?!

This damned household! I have to escape from this house now, at least! But if I run away, what about my sister who will be left behind? I've made my decision! We're going to run away together!

'Larisa. Let's go find that prince who will make you happy!'

But: "Please marry me."

Prince, why are you proposing to me? Your partner isn't me, but my sister! This sister of yours will make you a 'perfect ending plan'!

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/54970327), [Naver Series](http://naver.me/GLuxzytv)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8F%99%ED%99%94-%EC%86%8D-%EC%95%85%EC%97%AD%EC%9D%98-%EC%99%84%EB%B2%BD%ED%95%9C-%EC%97%94%EB%94%A9-%ED%94%8C%EB%9E%9C/2867), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58925157)

**Official Translations:**

* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/112309)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%9C%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%B9%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%93%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2/382)

title: The Chaebeol’s Youngest Son
summary:
Jin Runcandel was destined to become the head of his swordmaster clan. But despite his best efforts, he's banished for his shoddy swordsmanship. Though Jin eventually makes a contract with the god Solderet and is freed from the curse that hindered his abilities, he meets a rather unfortunate end. In the next moment, however, he awakens as a baby, long before his tragedy began.

Armed with a second chance and some new powers, Jin swears to fulfill his destiny and become the ultimate swordmaster!

title: Everyone’s Darling
summary:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?

title: Miss Not-So Sidekick
summary:
Hyejung loved to read to escape her daily stress. But that's before she woke up inside the bizarre world of her favorite novel! Instead of the main heroine who courts three eligible men, she is now Latte Ectrie - a minor villain that everyone hates?! One way or another, it's a chance to live out her most beloved storyline, with popcorn in hand to watch all the drama! Taking charge of the narrative takes on a whole new meaning!

---

**Contents:** 139 + 30 (epilogue) + 9 (side story) = 178 chapters
- **Vol. 1:** main story (ch. 1-139)
- **Vol. 2:** epilogue (ch. 140-169)
- **Vol. 3:** side story (ch. 170-178)

title: Screw the Noble Life, I’m Going Home
summary:
Lady Solea's family can't figure out how she lost her memories or why she keeps raving about her "jackpot." They don't realize she's actually Yoon Jiyoon, a lottery winner who was suddenly brought into their world! Determined to return to her reality and claim her riches, Jiyoon sets off a series of shenanigans to send herself home. Yet when Solea's family proves more fun than expected and distracts her from the mission to leave, Jiyoon begins to wonder if family is worth more than a fortune...

---
After confirming that I had won the lottery, I tried to quit my job! However, as soon as I opened the door, I found myself transmigrated into the body of a noble lady. I have one year to claim the prize money, so I have to return home at all costs. Please wait for me, my 1.7 million won! Mum will be there soon, but... What's wrong with this family?!

"I love you." But I'm not your daughter!

"Sister, you might get hurt so I'll hold you." Did he mean he would lift me? What is this guy, a giant brown bear?

"If you mess with our sister one more time, I'll make you disappear without a trace." He's got a pretty face, but he has a sharp tongue.

"Don't fall ill." Don't worry about me. Why are there so many of them?! I'm not a noble lady! Leave me alone, I wanna go home!

title: The Regressed Son of a Duke is an Assassin
summary:
Cyan Vert, illegitimate son of the Duke and the empire's greatest assassin, is betrayed by the righteous brother whose shadow he's always lived in. But just before the fatal blow strikes his throat, Cyan awakes to find he's just a boy again. The young lord has been reborn, and this time, he's not going to live in anyone's shadow!

---
Cyan Vert, the best assassin of the continent, meets a pitiful death after having been betrayed by his own brother, whom he had trusted all his life.

"If I were given another chance at life, I would live it differently. I would only trust myself, and achieve all the things I want on my own without serving anyone else but myself."

That is how he was given a second chance at life. Cyan Vert, a shadow who lived for others, is no more. He will now pave a path on his own, for only him!

title: My Husband Was Stolen Twice
summary: What if your whole life was predetermined? When Noelle Ainelle is reborn as an evil marchioness, she learns she is fated to die alongside her 5-year-old daughter at her husband’s hands. But with a new attitude and a will to live, Noelle resolves to salvage her marriage for their daughter’s sake. Too bad her husband, Rupert Ainelle, is a war-loving marquess who knows nothing but violence. With the clock ticking before the unthinkable, can this villainess make peace with her warmonger husband?

title: I’ll Borrow Your Face
summary:
1-3. Though I'd Always Loved You  
When Saki was in elementary school, she was dumped without notice by Chikage who was eight years her senior. She was extremely shocked because she believed that he would be her future husband! With a change of attitude, while at the high school entrance ceremony she decided that she dreamed of finding a new love, but at that time she met Chikage again, who has now become a teacher. As usual, she is shocked to realize that she still has feelings for Chikage. How does Chikage feel about Saki…?!  
  
4. My Lovely Beast  
Modoka decides to confess to her long-time crush, but accidentally gets the wrong person!?  
  
5. Love, to Burn, Fingertip  
Mari wants to be a manicurist, but is too shy to ask to paint someone's nails. Is her dream already out of reach?  
  
6. In my Shining Eyes, I See Your Face  
When Tae falls down the stairs, it might just change her world…

title: Omniscient Reader’s Viewpoint
summary: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.

title: When a K-Eldest Daughter Possesses a Childcare Novel
The Ten Thousand Races Invasion: Guardian of the Rear
summary: Invasion of the Ten Thousand Clans, universal superpowers, the era beyond time has arrived! In this age, all citizens are drafted to resist the foreign races and defend against external humiliation. Nan Ziying, at the tender age of adulthood, chooses to stay behind at the recruitment center, serving as logistical support. Many soldiers are disappointed, the youth scorn him, and white-haired elders take up arms and leave, leaving him behind with only women, children, and the elderly to guard the rear. Later, Nan Ziying awakens five great abilities and silently prepares. In this era where countless clans reign supreme and the times are filled with tragic heroism, ‘I am the calamity of these ten thousand clans!'

title: Reborn as a Monster 2: Rise of the Beast God
summary: A thousand years ago, under the blood moon, spatial rifts opened, heralding the era of monsters! Countless monsters rampaged across the globe! Just as humanity was on the brink of complete extinction, the emergence of “Beast Spirit Masters” brought a glimmer of hope to all of humanity! With generations of inheritance and the development of “Beast Spirit Masters”, humanity successfully created a new civilizational order to combat the monster invasion! Lin Yuan, who was a top assassin in his previous life but was tragically betrayed and killed by his organization, transmigrates…

title: All Football Talents Are Mine
summary: Uho-yeong had dreamed of becoming a soccer player. However, he was not blessed with the talent and died without realizing his dream, struck by lightning. It was then that the demon Mammon appeared, offering the ability to covet everyone's talents...

title: Put Me To Sleep
summary: Bakuya, a second-year high school student suffering from insomnia, however, one night, he meets Kimidori, a first-year girl who enjoys eating cup noodles yakisoba. Kimidori claims she can help Bakuya sleep; nevertheless, she enjoys playing pranks on him whenever she gets the chance.

title: Heavenly Demon Wants to Be A Chef
summary:
Due to a gate-related accident, Woojin regains the memories of his past life... a life as the Heavenly Demon, ruler of China! 

However, as the Heavenly Demon, there was a dream he never managed to achieve. Now, in this life, he'll do whatever it costs to fulfill his lifelong dream of becoming a chef! 

This is the legendary(?) story of Cheon Woojin, the former Heavenly Demon, chasing his dreams!

title: Darling, Why Do You Regret It?
summary:
I secretly met my husband's mistress. Delicate, lovely, and sweet, her name was Saira.

“I’ll never leave the Duke!”

“Now, *that’s* the spirit.”

“W-what?”

I had reincarnated as Tareia—a noblewoman with a wealthy family, beauty, and nothing to feel inferior about in life. But there was just one obstacle in my perfect plan: “Keep seducing my husband.”

I was ready to toss him aside and live a fabulous single life. 

...Or so I thought.

“I’m starting to find you fascinating.”

“Can I call you... 'Lea'?”

“My lady, please, anything but divorce.”

Why are these men suddenly acting like this?!

---
Watching on helplessly as her beloved husband carried on a whirlwind affair with a beautiful commoner, then dying tragically only to be replaced right away by that same mistress, Duchess DeLov was a pitiful figure... in the book I didn't even bother finishing! Okay, well, I'm not going to live that way. Step one: Ruin his reputation. Step two: Secure a divorce. Step three: Enjoy my happy, rich, single life! ...Step four: Fake a relationship with a handsome stranger to shake off our stalkers.

---
Tareya DeLov awakens in a novel to find herself married to the cold and aloof Duke Anteros Mel DeLov, who's cheating on her with a mistress! Appalled, she immediately petitions for divorce, hoping to keep her share of wealth and win the public's sympathy. But as the divorce comes closer to being approved, Anteros won't leave Tareya alone, remorseful and relentlessly begging her to reconsider. Will Tareya succeed in separating from her husband? And what's with Anteros' sudden shift in attitude?
